name: vs-seeker
effect: Reveals trainers who want a rematch, by showing !! over their heads. Each use drains the battery; requires 100 steps to charge.
short_effect: Allows rebattling of on-screen trainers. 100 steps to recharge.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A device that indicates Trainers who want to battle. Its battery charges while you walk.
flavor_text.platinum: A device that indicates Trainers who want to battle. Its battery charges while you walk.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A device that indicates Trainers who want to battle. Its battery charges while you walk.
